statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project=$(cat "$cwd/tracking/current-project.md" 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\n'); git_branch=$(git -C "$cwd" -c core.fileMode=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$project" ] && [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then echo "project-creator | $project [$git_branch]"; elif [ -n "$project" ]; then echo "project-creator | $project"; else echo "project-creator"; fi
